### Bookdown in R

This month's session, led by Peter Shum, will give us an Introduction to R Bookdown. Join us 1-2pm next Wednesday (October 15th) in Byrom Street JP 3.24.

   
### Resources

Peter has kindly provided his introductory slides: [Intro to Bookdown](https://github.com/LJMUtRicks/bag-of-tricks/tree/main/files/Bookdown/Intro to Bookdown.pdf) 

and material to code along: [zip file](https://github.com/LJMUtRicks/bag-of-tricks/tree/main/files/Bookdown/ljmutRicks-bookdown-tutorial.zip)

I did actually record the session, but unfortunately messed up the audio - so please watch with subtitles!
